subject: Basketball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: LeBron James had 19 points, all in the first half, and 9 assists as Miami evened the series, at 1-1, and handed Chicago its worst playoff loss in franchise history.
snippet: LeBron James had 19 points, all in the first half, and 9 assists as Miami evened the series, at 1-1, and handed Chicago its worst playoff loss in franchise history.
